attributes.action: Make XL Bully a banned dog breed in the Dangerous Dogs Act
attributes.additional_details: One campaign group has said it has identified 143 reported dog attacks involving XL Bully dogs in 2023 - over 20% of all dog attacks it has identified.
attributes.background: These dogs have been at the centre of numerous attacks of varying severity. I believe there is a need for these dogs to be placed on the list of banned dogs in the Dangerous Dogs Act, so it is illegal to sell, own or breed these dogs.

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
